item.title: U.S. stock futures fall after bitcoin’s weekend drop, as gold and silver’s sell-off may be bleeding into other markets
item.description: U.S. stock futures fell Sunday, following a weekend slide by bitcoin and Friday’s massive sell-off in precious metals capped a tumultuous first month ...

item.title: Oracle amps up its AI bet with a plan to raise as much as $50 billion this year
item.description: After issuing an $18 billion bond offering last fall, Oracle intends to tap the debt and equity markets anew in 2026.

item.title: Disney may soon have a new CEO. Here’s who it might be.

item.title: ‘We live on Social Security and pensions’: I’m in my 70s and my house needs repairs. Do I take out a $50K loan — or sell stocks?
The IRS is trying to make the best of a government shutdown. Here’s how to protect your refund.
item.description: The federal tax collector is using Biden-era funding to continue normal operations through next week, as filing season continues.
